ygData.subject: Re: Another Question about Fear
ygData.msgSnippet: If you are blinded you can not even use hotkeys.... *sigh*  I know this from personal exp.  Damn the mudmen!!!!!!! Jaxim
ygData.messageBody:
If you are blinded you can not even use hotkeys.... *sigh* I know this from
personal exp. Damn the mudmen!!!!!!!

Jaxim
